name: Nurse
text: Wait A Second... I dont think you should be he-

options.text: Wait, I found something that belongs to you
I came to talk to the janitor

name: Nurse
text: Something that belongs to me? What could that be?

options.text: I found this love letter addressed to you... from the Janitor

name: Nurse
text: A love letter? From... the janitor? *blushes* Oh my, I had no idea he felt that way! Thank you for bringing this to me.

options.text: Maybe I should keep it for now

name: Nurse
text: Thank you so much! This is so sweet of you. I'll make sure to talk to him about this. Here, take this as a token of my appreciation.

name: Nurse
text: Oh... well, i guess he didnt WANT to show it to me...

name: Nurse
text: Oh my! This is so passionate, I must speak to him RIGHT NOW!

name: Nurse
text: I said No! Yknow what.. SECURITY!

name: Nurse
text: Well, if you change your mind, you know where to find me.
